name: 5 Stages of Grief
description:
A GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 Entry by Sketch.E99

Jam Theme - DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

Five stages of grief is a game exploring what emotions or feelings one usually feel after experiencing a loss such as death.

You explore a space maze lookin for the exit, as the stage tells you what current stage of grief you are experiencing.

A short game with no enemies, and music that tries to reflect the stage of grief it represents.

Made with following free Assets:

INVECTOR - Third Person Controller - Basic

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/third-person-controlle...

Troglobytes -Daedalus - Random Dungeon Generator for Unity

https://troglobytes.itch.io/daedalus

Pavel Cristian - Free Footsteps System

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/audio/free-footsteps-system-47967#de...

WALLED CITY INFOTECH- Easy Main Menu Free - main menu

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/easy-main-menu-free-106495#publi...

pdkmusic - Best of pdkmusic.com (Free music pack)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/best-of-pdkmusic-com-free-musi...

Pirate Parrot - 20 Logo Templates with customizable PSD vector sources

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/20-logo-templates-with-custom...

Five stages of grief Wikipedia Article

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Five_stages_of_grief

Unity - How to change level using a collision and FPScontroller

Game Controls:

- W S Keys: Move the Character

- A D Keys: Rotate the Character

- Space: Jump 

- Find the Level Exit
